net.jodah.failsafe

Interface Policy<R>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - result type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CircuitBreaker, DelayablePolicy, FailurePolicy, Fallback, RetryPolicy, Timeout

    public interface Policy<R>
    A policy for handling execution failures.

    Part of the Failsafe SPI.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PolicyExecutor<Policy<R>> toExecutor(AbstractExecution execution)
      Returns an PolicyExecutor capable of performing an execution in the context of a Policy and handling results according to the Policy.

    • Method Detail

      • toExecutor

        PolicyExecutor<Policy<R>> toExecutor(AbstractExecution execution)
        Returns an PolicyExecutor capable of performing an execution in the context of a Policy and handling results according to the Policy.
